title: Graphic Design
job_overview:
Work from home graphich design role for somebody with a creative eye. We are looking for somebody who can take the lead in many of our design tasks as we expand our range of products. Tasks include making infographics, product packaging, A+ amazon conent and more. 

Great oppourtunity for the right person but we do require a certain level of ability. 

Illustrator, photoshop and canva pro skills required.
